radiographic_examinations.findings: Subtle, homogenous enhancement of multiple nerve roots.

Reduced amplitudes of bilateral sural sensory nerve action potentials; normal amplitudes in bilateral peroneal and left tibial action potentials with mildly prolonged distal latencies and moderate slowing of conduction velocities.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Essentially unchanged from the initial study.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Demonstrated fibrillation potentials and positive sharp waves in proximal and distal muscles of the left arm and leg; early recruitment of small motor unit action potentials in proximal muscles.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued to demonstrate widespread fibrillation potentials and positive sharp waves in the left arm and leg; reduced recruitment of motor unit action potentials in the legs.
